name: Silho
description:
SILHO is a simple fighting game featuring five unique characters to play as...

Keep close watch over your stamina, as it goes down the more you attack and block your opponent. Block with perfect timing to parry your opponents attack, taking less stamina than normal blocking whilst draining some of thiers!

Attacking also generates meter. Crouch, hold back, and attack for a special attack when the meter is full

CONTROLS:                                                                                                                

Player 1 - A/D to move, F to attack, W to block, and S to crouch 

Player 2 - Left/Right Arrow Keys to move, CTRL to attack, UP to block, and DOWN  to crouch

CHARACTER SPECIFIC ATRIBUTES:

The Samurai's special attack is an unblockable thrust

The Pigman's special attack is a counter. Get your opponent to attack you within the short period of time after activating it to negate all damage and dish out some of your own

The Gunner replaces its meter with two loads of buckshot. Use the special attack input to load your gun, and crouch attack to fire. You can hold up to two bullets at once

The Creature's special attack is an invincible teleport. Use this to retreat from danger

The Ninja's special is an invincible flip kick. Use this to clost the gap between you and your opponent
